#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;

int MOD = 1000000007;
int DP[4][5001][5001];

void solve(){
  char str[5001];
  int N,M;
  scanf("%s%d",str,&M);
  N = strlen(str);
  for(int k=0;k<4;++k){
    for(int i=0;i<=N;++i)
      for(int j=0;j<=N;++j)
        {
          if(i==0) DP[k][i][j]=((k==0 && j==0)?1:0);
          else if(k==0) DP[k][i][j] = 0;
          else if(str[i-1]=='a') DP[k][i][j] = DP[k-1][i-1][j-1]+DP[k][i-1][j-1];
          else DP[k][i][j] = DP[k][i-1][j] + DP[k-1][i-1][j];
          if(DP[k][i][j]>=MOD) DP[k][i][j]-=MOD;
        }
        for(int i=1;i<=N;++i)
          for(int j=0;j<=N;++j)
            {
              DP[k][i][j]+=DP[k][i-1][j];
              if(DP[k][i][j]>=MOD) DP[k][i][j]-=MOD;
            }
      }
  int ans = 0;
  for(int j=M;j<=N;++j)
    {
      ans += DP[3][N][j];
      if(ans>=MOD) ans -= MOD;
    }
  printf("%d\n",ans);
  return ;
}

int main (){
  int TC;
  scanf("%d",&TC);
  while(TC--)
    solve();

  return 0;
}
